metadata.description:
Renders an image for a given widget.

Props:
- `accountId`
- `widgetName`
- `metadata` (optional) - will be fetched by default
- `className` (optional) - `"d-inline-block"` by default
- `style` (optional) - `{ width: "3em", height: "3em" }` by default
- `imageStyle` (optional) - `{ objectFit: "cover", borderRadius: "0.6em" }` by default
- `imageClassName` (optional) - `"shadow w-100 h-100"` by default
- `thumbnail` - `"thumbnail"` by default
metadata.name: Image for a given Widget
